trans-unit.resname: PCMD·184 | Basandra, Battle Seraph | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Players can't cast spells during combat. {R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·184 | Basandra, Battle Seraph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why listen to the mumblings of wizards when the lash speaks true?"

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·196 | Edric, Spymaster of Trest | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·196 | Edric, Spymaster of Trest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·213 | Nin, the Pain Artist | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·213 | Nin, the Pain Artist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {X}{U}{R}, {T}: Nin, the Pain Artist deals X damage to target creature. That creature's controller draws X cards.

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·213 | Nin, the Pain Artist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·227 | Skullbriar, the Walking Grave | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste Whenever Skullbriar, the Walking Grave deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Counters remain on Skullbriar as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.

trans-unit.resname: PCMD·234 | Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink Sacrifice a creature: Put X +1/+1 counters on Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Remove all +1/+1 counters from Vish Kal: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter removed this way.
